text:
="preserve">Harold William Holman (16 November 1957 – 6 November 2020) was an English professional footballer. He played as a forward for Exeter City and Peterborough United in the Football League. His career lasted from 1976 to 1979. He was born in Exeter, England.
Holman died on 6 November 2020, just ten days before his 63rd birthday.
